1.title: Todo mundo tem uma vida secreta. Ou mais de uma...

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Couples (TV Series 2017– )

1.plot: The Tantra Institute, headed by therapist and sexologist Sofia and her partner Miranda, is a center for alternative therapies specializing in techniques seeking to offer a full sex life.

2.title: A casa do caracol não é o caracol? Ou é?

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Couples (TV Series 2017– )

2.plot: The death of her patient Daniel is deeply troubling to Sofia. Inspector Figueira and Detective Luis interrogate Sofia but she refuses to talk.

3.title: Uma parede cheia de fotos

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Couples (TV Series 2017– )

3.plot: Sofia remains a suspect. Vicente disagrees with the police and shares his suspicions with Renata.

4.title: Uma família como outra qualquer

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Couples (TV Series 2017– )

4.plot: Detective Luis is pressuring Tarso to disclose who Daniel had a fight with on the night of the awards party. Vicente and Renata interview Edgar Eleno, who insinuates that he can help Vicente with his career.

5.title: Nem pra você eu conto tudo

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Couples (TV Series 2017– )

5.plot: Vicente interviews Sofia and asks about the relationship between Daniel and Edgar Eleno.

6.title: O seu segredo está bem guardado comigo

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Couples (TV Series 2017– )

6.plot: Renata manages to access Tarso's personal e-mail and searches it thoroughly in her hunt for information. Edgar Eleno's son says too much to the police.

7.title: Algumas meninas escolhem fazer a coisa errada

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Couples (TV Series 2017– )

7.plot: HD. 'Some girls choose to misbehave.' (Season One) Luis is surprised by who shows up during his meeting with Erick.

8.title: Quem faz perguntas somos nós

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Couples (TV Series 2017– )

8.plot: HD. 'We ask the questions.' (Season One) Renata pressures Vicente to publish the cyber-attack story, while Vicente grows closer to Giordana.

9.title: E é com sexo que você quer investigar alguma coisa?

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Couples (TV Series 2017– )

9.plot: Edgar Eleno tells Vicente that the story of the cyber attack is nothing but a rumor and also explains why he threw Erick out of the house.

10.title: O Poder não corrompe, o Poder revela

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Couples (TV Series 2017– )

10.plot: Luis wants to know why Sofia said he was about to kill someone else as he was hitting Erick but she says she has no idea what he's talking about.

11.title: Não existe lugar seguro na cidade

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Couples (TV Series 2017– )

11.plot: Edgar Eleno has fallen ill and as they await the arrival of the ambulance, Vicente takes the opportunity to insert Renata's pen-drive into the banker's computer.

12.title: Fica com Deus

episode of.title: The Secret Life of Couples (TV Series 2017– )

12.plot: The hacker does not show up at the meeting and but convinces Sofia to turn over the pen-drive. Giordana finally lets loose about the abuse she suffered.

imdb.plot outline: The Tantra Institute, headed by therapist and sexologist Sofia and her partner Miranda, is a center for alternative therapies specializing in techniques seeking to offer a full sex life. Sofia divides her time between providing treatment at the Institute and writing her second book, The Secret Life of Couples. Ricardo and Marta, who have gone to war with each other, are two of Sofia's patients. As is Daniel who is currently very worried and distressed. He works at the Andreazza Bank and is convinced that someone is after him - so much so that he has taken the trouble to hire a private investigator, and he has also entrusted Sofia with a pen-drive containing confidential information for her to keep in a safe place. But Sofia herself is also under pressure: her ex-husband, Jonas, wants her to sign their divorce papers and is threatening to reveal her secrets if she doesn't comply.
imdb.title: The Secret Life of Couples
plot: Sofia Prado is a sexologist, therapist and director of an alternative therapy center for couples.

The Tantra Institute, headed by therapist and sexologist Sofia and her partner Miranda, is a center for alternative therapies specializing in techniques seeking to offer a full sex life. Sofia divides her time between providing treatment at the Institute and writing her second book, _The Secret Life of Couples_ (qv). Ricardo and Marta, who have gone to war with each other, are two of Sofia's patients. As is Daniel who is currently very worried and distressed. He works at the Andreazza Bank and is convinced that someone is after him - so much so that he has taken the trouble to hire a private investigator, and he has also entrusted Sofia with a pen-drive containing confidential information for her to keep in a safe place. But Sofia herself is also under pressure: her ex-husband, Jonas, wants her to sign their divorce papers and is threatening to reveal her secrets if she doesn't comply.::HBO Latin America
synopsis: The Tantra Institute, headed by therapist and sexologist Sofia and her partner Miranda, is a center for alternative therapies specializing in techniques for a full sex life that does not ignore or repress anything.At present, Sofia divides her time between providing treatment at the Institute and writing her book, The Secret Life of Couples. At her elegant consulting office she receives individuals as well as couples, such as Ricardo and Marta who have gone to war with each other.One of her patients is Daniel, whose relationship with Sofia reaches levels beyond the confines of her Consulting office, is currently worried and distressed. He works at the Andreazza Bank and is convinced that someone is after him - so much so that he has taken the trouble to hire a private investigator to assist him. He has also entrusted Sofia with a pen-drive containing confidential information for her to keep in a safe place.Sofia herself is also under pressure. Her ex-husband, Jonas, wants her to sign their divorce papers and is threatening to reveal her secrets if she doesn't comply.Vicente is a journalist who works on the internet portal entitled "The Forum." He has just been assigned to do a profile of Edgar Eleno Andreazza, a powerful banker and one of the most influential men in the country, who is soon to receive an award. Vicente and the photographer Renata were recently hired to work for The Forum. They were assigned to cover the awards ceremony attended by some very important people, such as Zairo, Vice President of the Republic, and Tarso, President of the Senate, along with Edgar's children, Erick, a playboy, and Giordana, who prefers to be more discreet. Far from the spotlights, however, much is at stake, and someone is in a lot of danger.
